InitialNarration.content: 突然出现的发光的涂鸦，刚刚好像在加载的什么程序，屏幕上的信息，奇怪的符号…
面前看起来一模一样的墙和完全不一样的地板…
还有身上这一身…不会是变成章鱼了吧

Disk1.content: 把形似录像带的物件插入翻译器后，出现了这样一段录像，不知为何，居然在鞘猫身上浮现了人类的文字：
（电流声）
……这个有在运行吗？
看起来是有的。
看起来是有的。
你好……你看起来很眼熟。
对不起......现在要用这样的方式和你见面。
很抱歉把你卷进这件事。
我是……
（电流声）
嗯？
（电流声）
在这里停住？！
总之，为了这片大地的存续，我必须留在这里。这就是我的使命。
你到底是谁……
然而这片大地......可能终究还是挺不过那次大灾厄的恶果。
所以……？
所以，哪怕这自私十分，我还是想要把拯救这片我所深爱的大地的任务，交给初来乍到的你。
来自与“伟大存在”有关的你。
啊？
到“塔”那里去吧，在那里你可以获得地区的信息。每个地区都有一位堪称德高望重的长老，他们会些许你们世界的语言，也有着往古来今渊博的知识，可以为你的一些疑问带来解答。
也许，途中你会经过我们生活的地方，而由于能源系统正逐渐分崩离析，许多设施由于能源的缺失，都无法运行。
请到能量井去看看有什么办法，帮帮我的同胞。
随着背景一阵轰隆隆的响声，似乎是热浪正在将画面变得扭曲，对方拿起摄像机，没注意到录制没有停止
最后一帧画面里看到了集市模样的地方，但……
影片在一片电流声中莫名其妙终止了。

Disk2.content: 似乎是和先前见到的录像带一样构造的物品，外观上比之前那件新上不少
（画面一开始还是被热浪扭曲的一片，然后传来了摄像机被用力拍打的声音）
（电流声）
时间……已经不多了
如果你知道了那么多事情后还是执意想来找我……
我连这里是哪怎么回去都没搞清楚，还被托付了这么莫名其妙的使命，怎么可能不去找你……
你或许已经知道了我目前在这个世界的火山里，无法离开。
我不知道啊！
然而想要到达这个地方，要闯过一路上即使是我们也并不方便途径的道路
你需要成为，模仿我们的行为方式。
成为？模仿？什么意思？
……不要觉得我在说傻话啦，这是可以办到的，你需要 “能力”。
（电流声）
又来？
画面中的对方好像在告诉你更多有关于能力的事情，但是突然只有模糊的画面和电流声。
总之，许愿井可以帮到你。
许愿井是吧，我记住了。
还有还有，在一个区域的许愿井只能得到这个区域的“能力”，另外两个区域你可以通过渡轮前往。
虽然不知道为什么水里也有水，但是我还挺期待的。
不过现在码头可能已经坏掉了无法登船……之后再说吧。
我能修吗？
背景里传来了更大更密集的响声，镜头里能看到每只鞘猫身上都浮现出了表示惊恐的文字
我得走了。
拜托你了，只有你能帮助我和我的同胞。
录像中弹出了似乎是录像机的警告——环境过热，暂停录制。

Disk3.content: 又是一段录像，开头的画面摇摇晃晃。
画面是自己之前来过的，在前面录像带里见过的集市。
身材高大的，是没见过品种的大只鞘猫带着小鞘猫在摊子前驻留，挑选食材。
下意识觉得他们是亲子关系，但是它们的身体特征完全不一样……
对方在用鞘猫语“自言自语”些什么
欸，原来我一路走过来都开着录像吗……
是的。
既然开着，那和你说说也好……
我也这么想。
我其实是想在最后的时光里，回想一下我的三亲。
三亲？
要说给你介绍一下，也不是不行。
只不过想要见到他们所有，就要跑到另外两个区域了。
我觉得还是很遗憾的，在完成必须完成的使命之前，或许连最后见上一面的机会都没有。
那确实有些遗憾。
如果有机会的话，帮我带个话吧。
嗯？
如果你到了那片没什么光线的深海森林的话，可能可以找到我的其中一位亲人。
到了那片温度宜人的半山腰的话，别被体型大了点的我们一族吓到……
大了点？
你一定会感到惊讶吧，我们种族居然会有三个亲人。
是的。
除了这个，你要惊讶的事情大概还多得很。
我预料到了。
该到塔那边去了，趁着火山那边情况没有恶化，我还有话要交代……
一如既往地，祝你一路顺风。
镜头最后指向了高耸的塔，黯红的天空，背景里依旧是咕嘟咕嘟的响声，大鞘猫抓紧了小鞘猫的触须，好像是下定了某种决心。

Disk4.content: 在一片陌生的空间中。
你真的到这里了吗？
--，我果然没有错看你嘛！不愧是我的，你是怎么自称的？我没记错的话，主人？
虽然离拯救鞘猫们还有段距离，但是你已经完成了三分之一啦！做得好！
总感觉这个意思是有人只做了三分之一……
之后的旅途，会是什么样子呢？
到深海的迷雾森林里会不会因为太暗而迷路？
到了高山上会不会因为岩石崎岖无法着脚？
越说越……
我知道，后面你会意识到一些事情……
突然正经起来了？
一些有关于鞘猫何为鞘猫，以及我们和人类之间的……各种事情。
可能会颠覆你的认知，但是……
我相信你一定可以的。
谢谢你。
你应该也意识到了。但我还是想要提醒你——
你我不仅文字不同，看待事物的“视角”也不同。
同样一件东西，你我的感官所能感受到的，你我的文化所重视的，是完全不一样的。
即使是我的同胞们，使用同样的文字，但却也矛盾重重。
所以，不能把误解和矛盾巧妙地转嫁到所谓“语言的不同”。
因为观念的分裂，视角的差异，解读的出入……
地形、气候、环境、文化……
一切一切在过去曾塑造我们，在未来也将塑造我们的。
因为这些，我们从同一件东西中所得到的信息是必然不一样的。
所以会有文字的衍生和对撞，文化思维的冲击和震荡。
片面的信息和解读的误差引起了各种各样的暴欲、冲突和矛盾，使得祸乱的种子随风散布在大地之上。
如何能够消弭这种分歧，这种误差？
在我到人类世界的短暂旅途中，我明白了。
我们必须到那比天空更高的地方，才能拥有统一的视角……
然而，我也看到了：
那是仅存于观念中的，永远都达不到的视角。
你不会是……
嗯？
你应该认出我了吧？
哎？
我是小白啊！！你不是这么叫我的吗？！！！
（电流声）
（电流声）
我的话讲完了，不过好像有一帮家伙叫我还得边卖萌边说这句话，哎，那就说吧：
感谢你玩我们的游戏✪ ω ✪！！
影片在一片笑声中结束了。

InitialNarration.content: What in Christ's sake is going on here......
The illuminating graffiti, the program seems to be loading some stuff, the strange characters...
This wall that looks like completely identical but a floor that's 100% different...
...and what is this suit?... Have I become an octopus?
Well, seems like I should try to hang around and see if there's something useful

Disk1.content: After inserting the object resembling a videotape into the translator, this video appeared. For some reason, it showed human text on the octocat's body:
(Static)
Little Grey... is that your name?
I'm sorry... to meet you this way. I'm sorry for dragging you into this. I am...
Hey, strange, why does it keep stuttering here and won't play?
Who the heck are you!!???
No choice, I'll have to fast-forward through this missing data part.
To preserve this land, I must stay here. This is my mission. However, this land... may ultimately not survive the aftermath of the Great Cataclysm.
So, even if it's selfish, I still want to entrust you, a newcomer, with the task of saving this land I love.
You, who come from the 'higher world'.
Hey, hey, don't easily have expectations of others, it's tough for me too...

Go to the 'Tower'. There, you can get information about the regions. Each region has a highly respected elder. They know some of your world's language and have vast knowledge from ancient times to the present. They can answer some of your questions.
The octocat looked away and paused.
Perhaps, on your way, you will pass by where we live. Due to the energy system gradually collapsing, many facilities are not functioning because of the lack of energy.
Please visit the energy well and see if there's anything you can do to help my kin.
As the background rumbled, it seemed like heat waves were distorting the image. The octocat picked up the camera, not noticing that the recording hadn’t stopped.
The last frame showed what looked like a marketplace, but...
The film abruptly ended with a burst of static.

Disk2.content: It seems to be an object constructed similarly to the previous videotape, but it looks much newer.
(The screen starts with a distorted image from heat waves, then there's a sound of the camera being hit forcefully. The octocat speaks while 'running'):
Time... is running out.
If, after knowing so much, you still insist on seeing me, then I'll tell you how to find me.
I haven't even figured out who you are, yet I'm entrusted with such a baffling mission. How could I not come looking for you...
You must already know that I am currently in this world's volcano, unable to leave.
However, to reach this place, you'll need the elders' help to navigate the paths that are inconvenient for humans.
You need to become, to mimic our ways.
What do you mean, what do you mean?
...Don't think I'm talking nonsense, it's doable, you need 'abilities'.
The octocat in the video seems to be telling you more about abilities, but suddenly only blurred images and static appear.

Also, if you have met one elder, the other two elders each govern another region. You can reach them by ferry... but the dock might be broken now, so you'll have to find an octocat who can fix it first.
Louder and more frequent sounds came from the background, along with the murmuring of many octocats.
I have to go...
Please, please help me and my people...
The recording popped up a warning on the screen—environment overheating, recording paused.

Disk3.content: Another video, the beginning is shaky.
The scene is the marketplace you've seen before in the previous tapes.
A tall, unfamiliar breed of large octocat stays at a stall with a smaller octocat, selecting food.
You instinctively feel they're a mother and child, but their physical features are completely different...
The previous voice mumbles something in octocat language, followed by a moment of silence:
Hey, I had the camera running all the way here?
Oh well, I actually wanted to reminisce about my three parents in my final moments.
Three parents? Three?
Introducing them to you wouldn't be a bad idea... but to meet them, you'll have to go to two other regions.
It's quite regrettable that before completing my mission, I couldn't even have a final meeting with them...
If you reach the dark deep-sea forest, you might find one of my parents.
In the temperate mid-mountain area, don't be intimidated by the larger members of our species...
You might be surprised to learn that our species has three parents.
I never thought I would have two missions and three identities...
Three identities? What kind of plot twist is this?
I must go to the tower, while the situation at the volcano hasn't worsened. I need to give the elders my final words...
As always, I wish you a safe journey.
The camera finally points to the towering tower, a dark red sky, with bubbling sounds in the background. The large octocat holds the smaller one's tendrils tightly, as if making a firm decision.

Disk4.content: In a strange place.
Hey, did you really get here?
I knew I wasn't wrong about you! You truly are my master [ •̀ ω •́ ]✧!
Although there's still a long way to go to save the octocats, you've completed one-third! Well done!
It feels like someone only did one-third...
What will the next journey be like?
Will you get lost in the deep-sea fog forest because it's too dark?
Will you be unable to walk on the rocky mountains?
I know, later you will realize some things...
Some things about what an octocat is, and various matters between us and humans.
It might overturn your understanding, but...
I believe you can do it.
Before moving forward, please remember...
The reason octocats and humans have such complex relationships and language differences is because we perceive things differently.
The same thing is perceived differently by our senses and valued differently by our cultures...
It's not just a matter of language differences.
It's because of conceptual splits, perceptual differences, and interpretive gaps...
Culture, region, ethnicity...
Because of these, the information we get from the same thing is inevitably different.
So, there will be the emergence and clash of languages, the impact and shock of cultural thinking.
Fragmentary information and interpretive errors have led to various kinds of violence, conflict, and discord, spreading chaos across the land.
How can we eliminate these discrepancies and errors?
During my brief journey to the human world, I realized.
We must go to a place higher than the sky to have a unified perspective...
However, as one of your philosophers told us:
That is a perspective that exists only in concept, never attainable.
What, you still haven't recognized me?
It's Shiro!!! I'm Shiro￣へ￣!!!
Shiro! My Shiro, waah waah waah
I'm done talking, but it seems some folks insist I say this while being cute, so here it is:
Thank you for playing our game✪ ω ✪!!
The video ends with laughter.
